bio.about:
More than 5 years of Experience in Android programming and can adapt to all stages of advanced Android development. Knowledgeable in development, debugging, and maintenance processes. Proficient in various technologies, including Java, Kotlin, and Android/ IOS/ Web output with flutter.
Experience in teaching 2 classes and also leading 5 interns.
Also, familiar with UI/UX principles, have some experience in financial markets and am knowledgeable with and very passionate about Cryptocurrencies NFT, and Web3.

experiences.description:
- Implemented time tracker, location tracker, map, background service, notification, order food, etc.
- Cleaned and redesign code architecture
- Added Firebase Crashlytics to project
- Made android and IOS outputs.

I had the experience of being in a big and famous startup that made me understand the challenges of a big company with big teams and managing an application with more than 2 million of installations. As a team Player, As a team Player, I implemented Feeds, Posts, Comments, likes, Profiles, Search, Filters, Invoices, etc, and maintained the app

In this great team, I experienced working remotely for almost a year and I was able to overcome its challenges well and establish a good interaction with the team. I also developed good projects that helped me learn more.
